title: Targon shield support with kalista
body: Is there any news of a possibility for a champ to execute or last hit (ranged champs) a minion to share the gold/hp if kalistas passive Is on the minions? Or should I just never even bother to equip it? It's fine early game when her attack speed is slow but after that I stopped trying.

replies.body: I've been duoing with a friend of mine who plays Taric sup and he's used it every time. Seems to work for us.

> I've been duoing with a friend of mine who plays Taric sup and he's used it every time. Seems to work for us.

I'd assume because you're duo. In low elo yolo queue your Kalista doesn't care about your income, and that's where this is a big problem.
So tell your adc to let you last hit. simple dimple.

Relic Shield isn't made for ranged champs.

But Kalista's passive can make it really hard to use it even for melee and that's a massive pain because her ult is usually much better with a tank, and I don't want to play a tank with her because I can never use my stacks. ._.

I agree with OP. When I duo with my friend it is fine, but when there is a random Kalista they often haven't given me the room to get the executes, especially on the siege minions.
